source.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
    sua.id,
    CASE
        WHEN sa.address1 IS NOT NULL AND sa.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN
            CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2, ', ')
        WHEN sa.address1 IS NOT NULL THEN
            CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ')
        WHEN sa.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN
            CONCAT(sa.address2, ', ')
        ELSE ''
    END AS formatted_address,
    COALESCE(COALESCE(sst_en.name, sst_ar.name),'') AS city,
    COALESCE(scon.name, 'Saudi Arabia') AS country,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(regexp_replace(sa.zipcode, '[^0-9]', '', 'g'), '')::BIGINT, NULL) AS postal_code,
    sua.created_at,
    sua.updated_at,
    COALESCE(sdt_en.name, sdt_ar.name) AS district,
    COALESCE(sa.latitude, 0) AS latitude,
    COALESCE(sa.longitude, 0) AS longitude,
    COALESCE(sua.default, 'false') AS is_default,
    sua.user_id AS user_id,
    'other' AS type,
    COALESCE(
        CASE 
            WHEN sa.driver_meta_data IS NOT NULL THEN sa.driver_meta_data->>'verified'
            ELSE 'false'
        END, 'false') AS is_verified,  -- Ensure non-null value here
    '' AS title,
    sa.driver_meta_data->>'notes' AS comments
FROM
    spree_user_addresses sua
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses sa ON sua.address_id = sa.id
LEFT JOIN spree_countries scon ON sa.country_id = scon.id
LEFT JOIN spree_districts sdist ON sdist.id = sa.district_id
LEFT JOIN spree_district_translations sdt_en ON sdt_en.spree_district_id = sdist.id AND sdt_en.locale = 'en'
LEFT JOIN spree_district_translations sdt_ar ON sdt_ar.spree_district_id = sdist.id AND sdt_ar.locale = 'ar'
LEFT JOIN spree_state_translations sst_en ON sst_en.id = sa.state_id AND sst_en.locale = 'en'
LEFT JOIN spree_state_translations sst_ar ON sst_ar.id = sa.state_id AND sst_ar.locale = 'ar'
WHERE (sa.id IS NOT NULL AND city IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY sua.id DESC;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from address

SELECT distinct
	u.id as id,
    u.id AS user,
    u.encrypted_password AS password,
    u.password_salt,
    u.email,
    u.created_at,
    u.updated_at,
    CAST(CASE 
            WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
            ELSE FALSE
        END AS BOOLEAN) AS is_deleted,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as password_updated_at
	
FROM spree_users u
inner join spree_roles_users sru on sru.user_id = u.id
inner join spree_roles sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.id <> 2 and sr.name <> 'user'
where u.updated_at >= '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';

    u.password_salt,
    u.email,
    u.created_at,
    u.updated_at,
    CAST(CASE 
            WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
            ELSE FALSE
        END AS BOOLEAN) AS is_deleted,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as password_updated_at
	
FROM spree_users u
inner join spree_roles_users sru on sru.user_id = u.id
inner join spree_roles sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.id <> 2 and sr.name <> 'user'

SELECT 
    u.id AS user_id,
    u.encrypted_password AS password,
    u.password_salt,
    u.email,
    u.created_at,
    u.updated_at,
    CAST(CASE 
            WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
            ELSE FALSE
        END AS BOOLEAN) AS is_deleted,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as password_updated_at,
    false as is_email_verified,
    u.is_phone_verified as mobile_verified,
	case 
  	when sua.provider = 'google_oauth2' then 'google'
	else sua.provider end as login_type,
	sua.uid as social_id,
	coalesce(u.spree_api_key,'') as spree_api_key,
	case 
	when u.blacklisted_at is not null Then True
	ELSE false
	end as blacklisted
	
FROM spree_users u
left join spree_user_authentications sua on u.id = sua.user_id

source.query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  tag AS category, 
  created_at, 
  updated_at,
  Upper(tag) as code
FROM 
  spree_bin_categories;

SELECT 
  rt.id,
  COALESCE(rt.name_en,'') as name_en,
  COALESCE(CASE
  	WHEN LENGTH(rt.name_en) < 5 THEN UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g'))||'_' || rt.id
	ELSE UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', 'g'), 1, 1)) ||
           UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', ' ', 'g'), 2), ' ', ''), 1, 1)) ||
           '_' || rt.id
  END,'') AS code,
  rt.created_at,
  rt.updated_at,
  rt.temp_taxon_id,
  COALESCE(rt.name_ar,'') as name_ar
FROM (SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
    st.id AS temp_taxon_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) AS name_en,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) AS name_ar,
    st.created_at,
    st.updated_at
FROM spree_taxons st
LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
WHERE st.parent_id in (
  select st.id as brand_taxon_id from spree_taxons st 
  join spree_taxon_translations stt on stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id and locale = 'en'
  where stt."name"  = 'Brands'
)
GROUP BY st.id) as rt
order by rt.temp_taxon_id asc

alter table brand add column temp_taxon_id int;
SELECT 'Adding Temp Texon' as UpdateTaxon;

       a.iso3 AS iso_country_code,

FROM   spree_countries a;

Order by id ASC;

select 
	dtss.id, 
	cast(dts.start_time as text) as start_time, 
	cast(dts.end_time as text) as end_time,
	CASE
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday'
	Else 'sunday'
	END AS day_of_week,
	dtss.spree_shipping_method_id as delivery_option_id,
	coalesce(ds.id,0) as supermarket_id, 
	coalesce(dtss.delivery_capacity,0) as capacity, 
	null as time_slot_id, 
	dtss.enabled as is_enabled,
	dtss.created_at,
	dtss.updated_at
from danube_time_slots_schedules dtss
left join danube_time_slots dts on dts.id  = dtss.time_slot_id 
left join danube_supermarkets ds on ds.zone_id = dtss.zone_id
order by dts.id;

query.value:
UPDATE delivery_capacity dc
SET time_slot_id = ts.id
FROM time_slot ts
WHERE dc.start_time = ts.start_time
  AND dc.end_time = ts.end_time
  AND dc.day_of_week = ts.day_of_week
  AND dc.delivery_option_id = ts.delivery_option_id;
SELECT 'Time Slots are Updated' as Time_Slot_status

SELECT u.id,
sru.role_id,
u.email,
u.created_at,
u.updated_at,
CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  u.dob,
  COALESCE(
  CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),
  ''
  ) AS country_code,
  CASE WHEN sa.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE sa.country_id
  END AS country_id,
	'others' as gender,
	'admin' as user_type,
	'available' as availability,
  sr.name as role_name,
	CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN FALSE
    ELSE TRUE
  END AS active,
	CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN FALSE
    ELSE TRUE
  END AS status,
  sa.city
from spree_users u
inner join spree_roles_users sru on sru.user_id = u.id
inner join spree_roles sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.name <> 'user'
left join spree_user_addresses sua on sua.user_id = u.id and sua.default=TRUE
left join spree_addresses sa on sua.address_id = sa.id
order by u.id asc;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from employee;

source.query:
WITH json_to_extract AS
(
       SELECT id,
              quantity_en AS quantity,
              product_id,
              created_at,
              updated_at,
              quantity_ar,
              nutrients :: jsonb AS json_data
       FROM   spree_nutritional_facts )
SELECT    id,
          quantity,
          quantity_ar,
          product_id,
          calories,
          total_fat,
          saturated_fat,
          trans_fat,
          cholesterol,
          total_carbohydrates,
          sugar,
          dietary_fiber,
          protein,
          salt,
          sodium,
          iron,
          calcium,
          vitamin_a,
          vitamin_c,
          vitamin_d,
          ph,
          created_at,
          updated_at
FROM      json_to_extract
LEFT JOIN lateral
          (
                 Select ( Regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'calories:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]            AS calories,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'total_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS total_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'saturated_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]       AS saturated_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'trans_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS trans_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'cholesterol:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]         AS cholesterol,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'total_carbohydrates:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1] AS total_carbohydrates,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'sugar:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]               AS sugar,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'fiber:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]               AS dietary_fiber,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'protein:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]             AS protein,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'salt:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                AS salt,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'sodium:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]              AS sodium,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'iron:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                AS iron,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'calcium:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]             AS calcium,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_a:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_a,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_c:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_c,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_d:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_d,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'ph:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                  AS ph ) AS nutrient_values
ON        true
ORDER BY  id ASC;

SELECT id,
	COALESCE(sku, '') AS sku,
       COALESCE(Cast(price AS DOUBLE PRECISION),0) as price,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	COALESCE(name_en, '') AS name,
       1 AS country_id,
       1 AS order
FROM   spree_custom_products;

SELECT 
    id AS offline_product_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN (barcode_element ~ E'^\\d+$') THEN CAST(barcode_element AS BIGINT)
        ELSE -1
    END AS barcode,
    1 AS "order"
FROM   
    spree_custom_products
CROSS JOIN LATERAL unnest(barcodes) AS barcode_element
ORDER BY 
    id DESC;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from offline_product;

query.value:
SELECT id,
	COALESCE(sku, '') AS sku,
       COALESCE(Cast(price AS DOUBLE PRECISION),0) as price,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	COALESCE(name_en, '') AS name,
       1 AS country_id,
       1 AS order
FROM   spree_custom_products
where updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';

source.query:
select sot.id, 
	sott1.name as name_en,
	coalesce(sott2.name,'') as name_ar,
	coalesce(sott1.presentation,'') as presentation_en,
	coalesce(sott2.presentation,'') as presentation_ar,
    sot.created_at,
    sot.updated_at
	
from spree_option_types sot
left join spree_option_type_translations sott1 on sot.id = sott1.spree_option_type_id
and sott1.locale='en'
left join spree_option_type_translations sott2 on sot.id = sott2.spree_option_type_id
and sott2.locale='ar';

SELECT sov.id,
       coalesce(sovt1.name,'') as name,
       position,
	   coalesce(sovt1.presentation,'') as presentation_en,
       coalesce(sovt2.presentation,'') AS presentation_ar,
       sov.option_type_id,
       sov.created_at,
       sov.updated_at
FROM   spree_option_values sov
left join spree_option_value_translations sovt1
on sov.id = sovt1.spree_option_value_id and sovt1.locale='en'
left join spree_option_value_translations sovt2
on sov.id = sovt2.spree_option_value_id and sovt2.locale='ar';

SELECT distinct
    so.id,
    so.item_total,
    so.total,
    CASE
        WHEN so.state='delivery' THEN 'delivered'
        WHEN so.state='picking_and_staging_in_progress' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN so.state='payment' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN so.state='complete' THEN 'completed'
        WHEN so.state='confirm' THEN 'pending'
--         WHEN so.state='cart' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN so.state='canceled' THEN 'customer_cancelled'
    END AS status,
    so.user_id,
    so.completed_at,
    so.bill_address_id,
    so.ship_address_id,
    so.payment_total,
    so.created_at,
    so.updated_at,
    so.currency,
    so.item_count,
	so.canceled_at as cancelled_at,
    so.canceler_id as cancelled_by,
	CASE WHEN so.delivery_method='home_delivery' THEN 1
	WHEN so.delivery_method='store_pick_up' THEN 2
	ELSE NULL END as delivery_option_id,
	c.cancel_reason,
	e.city,
    1 as language_id,
	COALESCE(e.country_id,'1') as country_id,
	sp_max.payment_method_id as payment_option_id
	
from spree_orders so
LEFT JOIN spree_fulfilments c ON c.order_id = so.id
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses d ON d.user_id = so.user_id AND d.default = 'true'
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses e ON e.id = d.address_id
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
    SELECT *
    FROM spree_payments sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_payment_methods spm ON spm.id = sp.payment_method_id
    WHERE sp.order_id = so.id
	 AND (
		 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_payments WHERE order_id = so.id) <= 1 OR
		spm.type NOT IN ('Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint', 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit')
	 )
    ORDER BY sp.created_at DESC 
    LIMIT 1
) sp_max ON true
where so.state != 'cart'

select 
	so.id as order_id,
	so.bill_address_id as address_id,
	'true' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.bill_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id 
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

UNION ALL

select 
	ROW_NUMBER() over () as id,
	so.id as order_id,
	so.ship_address_id as address_id,
	'false' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.ship_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

Alter sequence order_address_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence' as update;

select sa.id,
	sa.order_id,
    sa.created_at,
    sa.updated_at,
    sa.source_id,
    sa.adjustable_id,
    sa.adjustment_reason_id as adjustable_reason_id,
    sa.amount,
    sa.promotion_code_id,
    sa.eligible,
    sa.included,
    sa.finalized,
    sa.free_sample,
    substring(sa.source_type,8) as source_type,
    sa.label,
    substring(sa.adjustable_type,8) as adjustable_type
from spree_adjustments sa
left join spree_orders so on sa.order_id = so.id and so.state !='cart'

WITH RankedResults AS (
    SELECT
        cancel_reason,
        created_at,
        updated_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cancel_reason ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS rn
    FROM spree_fulfilments
    WHERE cancel_reason IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
    cancel_reason AS reason_en,
    '' AS reason_ar,
    true AS visible,
    created_at,
    updated_at
FROM RankedResults
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT
    id,
    zatca_status,
    zatca_issued_date,
    zatca_signed_xml_url,
    zatca_uuid,
    zatca_invoice_hash,
    zatca_response,
    spree_invoice_id,  -- Assuming spree_invoice_id is a reference to the id column
    created_at,
    updated_at
FROM
    public.spree_invoice_logs;

SELECT
    id,
    order_id,
    type,
    public_id,
    is_qr_generated,
    is_pdf_generated,
    meta,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    qr_file_name,
    qr_content_type,
    qr_file_size,
    qr_updated_at,
    pdf_file_name,
    pdf_content_type,
    pdf_file_size,
    pdf_updated_at,
    qr_data,
    job_id,
    zatca_status,
    zatca_issued_date,
    zatca_signed_xml_url,
    zatca_uuid,
    zatca_invoice_hash,
    zatca_response
FROM
    public.spree_invoices;

SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() over () as id,
    sp.order_id,
    sp.response_code AS transaction_id,
    sp.amount,
    coalesce(so.currency,'') as currency,
    sp.state AS status,
    sp.payment_method_id AS payment_option_id,
    sp.source_id,
	  ss.id as shipment_id,
    substring(sp.source_type,8) AS source_type
FROM 
    spree_payments sp
left JOIN spree_orders so ON so.id = sp.order_id
LEFT JOIN spree_shipments ss on ss.order_id = so.id;

select 
sr.id,
sp.order_id,
case 
when sr.transaction_id is not null then sr.transaction_id 
else sp.response_code 
end as transaction_id,
sr.created_at,
sr.updated_at,
sr.amount,
case 
	when sr.status='uncertain' then 'pending'
	when sr.status='failed' then 'failed'
	when sr.status='success' then 'approved'
	else ''
End as status,
'SAR' as currency,
'' as type
From spree_refunds sr
inner join spree_payments sp on sp.id=sr.payment_id 
where sr.payment_id is not null;

WITH delivery_instructions AS (
    SELECT 
        sli.line_item_id,
        CONCAT(
            'Preferred Cut - ', COALESCE(spc.name, ''), '::', 
            STRING_AGG(CONCAT(' ', COALESCE(scp.name_en, ''), ' ', ROUND(sli.quantity / 1000.0, 2), ' ', 'kg'), ', '), 
            STRING_AGG(CONCAT(' ', COALESCE(scp.name_ar, ''), ' ', ROUND(sli.quantity / 1000.0, 2), ' ', 'kg'), ', ')
        ) AS delivery_instruction
    FROM spree_line_item_cut_patterns sli
    LEFT JOIN spree_cut_patterns scp ON scp.id = sli.cut_pattern_id 
    LEFT JOIN spree_preferred_cuts spc ON spc.id = scp.preferred_cut_id
    WHERE sli.quantity > 0
    GROUP BY sli.line_item_id, spc.name
    ORDER BY sli.line_item_id
)
SELECT 
    sli.id,
    sli.variant_id AS product_variant_id,
    coalesce(CASE 
        WHEN  sv.weight_increment > 0 AND sv.default_weight_count > 0 AND sv.max_weight_per_order > 0 -- weighted product 
        then
          case
           when sli.requested_quantity < sv.weight_increment and sli.requested_quantity >0
           	then sv.weight_increment  / sli.requested_quantity
            else sli.requested_quantity /sv.weight_increment 
            end
        ELSE sli.requested_quantity 
    END,0) AS quantity,
    -- Determine picked_weight based on conditions
    CASE 
        WHEN  sv.weight_increment > 0 AND sv.default_weight_count > 0 AND sv.max_weight_per_order > 0 -- weighted product 
        THEN sli.quantity 
        ELSE NULL
    END AS picked_weight,
    -- Determine picked_quantity based on conditions
    COALESCE(
        CASE 
            WHEN sv.weight_increment > 0 AND sv.default_weight_count > 0 AND sv.max_weight_per_order > 0
                THEN 1
                ELSE sli.quantity
        END, 0
    ) AS picked_quantity,
    sli.price,
    sli.created_at,
    sli.replaced,
    so.state,
    COALESCE(sli.updated_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at,
    CASE 
        WHEN sli.on_sale = false THEN sli.price
        ELSE '0.0'
    END AS action_price,
    CASE 
        WHEN sli.on_sale = true THEN sli.price
        ELSE '0'
    END AS sale_price,
    0 AS picker_id,
    sv.product_id,
    di.delivery_instruction,
    sli.order_id AS order_shipment_id,
    CASE
        WHEN so.replace_product::varchar = 'true' THEN 'replace-with-similar-product' 
        WHEN so.replace_product::varchar = 'false' THEN 'cancel'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS replacement_pref,
    1 AS category_id,
    '' AS status
FROM spree_line_items sli
LEFT JOIN spree_variants sv ON sv.id = sli.variant_id
LEFT JOIN spree_orders so ON so.id = sli.order_id
LEFT JOIN delivery_instructions di ON sli.id = di.line_item_id
-- left join spree_product_translations spt on spt.spree_product_id = sv.product_id and spt.locale = 'en'
WHERE so.state != 'cart'
order by sli.id desc;

Alter sequence order_product_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Reset Sequence ID' As Update;
select * from spree_orders_promotions;

WITH cte AS (
    SELECT  
        so.id AS id,                        -- shipment_id 
        so.id AS order_id,
        CASE
            WHEN so.state = 'delivery' THEN 'delivered'
            WHEN so.state = 'picking_and_staging_in_progress' THEN 'pending'
            WHEN so.state = 'payment' THEN 'pending'
            WHEN so.state = 'complete' THEN 'completed'
            WHEN so.state = 'confirm' THEN 'pending'
            WHEN so.state = 'canceled' THEN 'customer_cancelled'
        END AS order_status,
        so.created_at,
        so.updated_at,
        CAST((so.total * (so.vat_percentage / 100)) AS DOUBLE PRECISION) AS tax_total,
        so.total,
		cast(dsto.start_time as text) as start_time, 
        cast(dsto.end_time as text) as end_time, 
		CASE
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday'
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday'
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday'
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday'
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday'
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday'
			WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday'
			Else 'sunday'
		END AS day_of_week,
		dtss.spree_shipping_method_id as delivery_option_id,
        so.order_type,
        so.supermarket_id,
        sla.delivery_date,
        sa.amount AS delivery_charges,
        FALSE AS is_delivery_on_hold,
        so.created_at AS processing_start_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY so.id ORDER BY so.id) AS row_num
    FROM spree_orders so
    LEFT JOIN danube_slot_to_orders dsto ON dsto.order_id = so.id
	left join danube_time_slots_schedules dtss on dtss.id = dsto.time_slots_schedule_id
    LEFT JOIN spree_lift_assignments sla ON sla.order_id = so.id
    LEFT JOIN spree_adjustments sa ON sa.order_id = so.id AND sa.label = 'Express Fee'
    WHERE so.state != 'cart'
)
SELECT *
FROM cte
WHERE row_num = 1;

SELECT id,
       name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       deleted_at,
       CASE
            WHEN type = 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit' THEN 'e-wlt'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::PayFort' THEN 'credit'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::CheckoutCom' THEN 'credit'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::Tamara' THEN 'tamara'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::BogusSimple' THEN 'bogus-simple'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::PaymentMethod::Check' THEN 'cod'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::CheckoutCom::ApplePay' THEN 'a-pay'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint' THEN 'loy-pts'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::PayFort::ApplePay' THEN 'a-pay'
        Else '' 
		End as code
FROM   spree_payment_methods
where name is not null
ORDER  BY id ASC;

WITH brand AS (
  SELECT 
    rt.id,
    COALESCE(rt.name_en,'') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(
      CASE
        WHEN LENGTH(rt.name_en) < 5 THEN 
          UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) || '_' || rt.id
        ELSE 
          UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', 'g'), 1, 1)) ||
          UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', ' ', 'g'), 2), ' ', ''), 1, 1)) ||
          '_' || rt.id
      END, 
    '') AS code,
    rt.created_at,
    rt.updated_at,
    rt.temp_taxon_id,
    COALESCE(rt.name_ar, '') AS name_ar
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
      st.id AS temp_taxon_id,
      MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) AS name_en,
      MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) AS name_ar,
      st.created_at,
      st.updated_at
    FROM spree_taxons st
    LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
    WHERE st.parent_id IN (
      SELECT st.id 
      FROM spree_taxons st 
      JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id AND stt.locale = 'en'
      WHERE stt.name = 'Brands'
    )
    GROUP BY st.id
  ) AS rt
  ORDER BY rt.temp_taxon_id ASC
), 
supplier AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(spt.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS name,
    LEFT(COALESCE(spt.code, ''), 10) AS code,
    MAX(spt.created_at) AS created_at,
    MAX(spt.updated_at) AS updated_at,
    MAX(spt.deleted_at) AS deleted_at
  FROM (
    SELECT
      spree_product_id,
      MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) AS supplier_name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'ar' THEN manufacturer END) AS code,
      MAX(created_at) AS created_at,
      MAX(updated_at) AS updated_at,
      MAX(deleted_at) AS deleted_at
    FROM spree_product_translations
    WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY spree_product_id
  ) AS spt
  GROUP BY spt.code
), 
cte AS (
  SELECT 
    sp.id,
    sp.tax_category_id,
    sp.refundable,
    sp.moq_limit,
    sp.meta_title,
    sp.loyalty_point,
    sp_table.validity_tag_ar,
    sp_table.validity_tag,
    sp_table.slug,
    sp_table.size,
	REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(sp_table.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS supplier_code,
    COALESCE(sp_table.name_ar, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.name, '') AS name,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_keywords_ar, '') AS meta_keywords_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_keywords, '') AS meta_keywords,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_description_ar, '') AS meta_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_description, '') AS meta_description,
    COALESCE(sp_table.short_description_ar, '') AS short_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.long_description_ar, '') AS long_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.short_description, '') AS short_description,
    COALESCE(sp_table.long_description, '') AS long_description,
    COALESCE(sp.is_loyalty_reward, 'false') AS issue_loyalty_points,
    CASE
      WHEN sp.electronic_product_code = '' THEN NULL 
      ELSE CAST(sp.electronic_product_code AS INT)
    END AS electronic_product_code,
    CASE
      WHEN sp.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
      ELSE FALSE
    END AS is_deleted,
    COALESCE(sp.crushable, false) AS crushable,
    sp.created_at,
    sp.updated_at,
    sp.cod_enabled,
    COALESCE(CAST(sp.available_on AS DATE), CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATE)) AS available_on,
    sp.bundled,
    sp.bin_category_id,
    brand_taxon.temp_taxon_id AS default_taxon_id,
    sv.width,
    sv.weight_increment,
    CASE 
        WHEN  sv.weight_increment > 0 AND sv.default_weight_count > 0 AND sv.max_weight_per_order > 0 -- weighted product 
        THEN sv.weight_increment
        Else sv.weight
    End as weight,
    sv.sku,
    case when
    CAST(sv.perform_liquid_weight_check AS INT) = 0 Then 'False'
    ELSE 'True'
    END AS perform_liquid_weight_check,
    sv.max_weight_per_order,
    sv.height,
    sv.depth,
    sv.default_weight_count,
    FALSE AS promotable,
    TRUE AS is_wishlisted,
    FALSE AS is_gluten_free,
    '' AS discount,
    FALSE AS deactivate,
    ds_country.country_id,
    1 AS category_id,
    brand_taxon.brand_id AS brand_id
  FROM spree_products sp
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      sp.id,
	  MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) as supplier_name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.validity_tag END) AS validity_tag_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.validity_tag END) AS validity_tag,
      MAX(sptrans.slug) AS slug,
      MAX(sptrans.pack_size) AS size,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.name END) AS name_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.name END) AS name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.meta_keywords END) AS meta_keywords_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.meta_keywords END) AS meta_keywords,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.meta_description END) AS meta_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.meta_description END) AS meta_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.description END) AS short_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.description END) AS long_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.description END) AS short_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.description END) AS long_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.manufacturer END) AS supplier_code
    FROM spree_products sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_product_translations sptrans ON sptrans.spree_product_id = sp.id
    GROUP BY sp.id
  ) AS sp_table ON sp_table.id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      sp.id, 
      db.country_id 
    FROM spree_products sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_product_inventory_modifiers sim ON sp.id = sim.product_id
    LEFT JOIN danube_supermarkets db ON sim.rule_supermarket_id = db.id
    GROUP BY sp.id, db.country_id
  ) AS ds_country ON sp.id = ds_country.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY prod_taxon.product_id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC) AS row_num,
      b.temp_taxon_id,
      b.id AS brand_id, 
      prod_taxon.product_id AS product_id
    FROM brand b 
    LEFT JOIN spree_products_taxons prod_taxon ON b.temp_taxon_id = prod_taxon.taxon_id
  ) AS brand_taxon ON brand_taxon.product_id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY product_id ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS row_num, 
      *
    FROM spree_variants 
  ) sv ON sv.product_id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN supplier sup ON sup.code = sp_table.supplier_code AND sup.code != ''
  WHERE (brand_taxon.row_num = 1 OR brand_taxon.row_num IS NULL) 
    AND (sv.row_num = 1 OR sv.row_num IS NULL)
GROUP BY 
        sp.id, 
        sp.tax_category_id,
        sp.refundable,
        sp.moq_limit,
        sp.meta_title,
        sp.loyalty_point,
        sp_table.validity_tag_ar,
        sp_table.validity_tag,
        sp_table.slug,
		brand_taxon.temp_taxon_id,
        sp_table.size,
        sp_table.supplier_name,
        sp_table.name_ar,
        sp_table.name,
        sp_table.meta_keywords_ar,
        sp_table.meta_keywords,
        sp_table.meta_description_ar,
        sp_table.meta_description,
        sp_table.short_description_ar,
        sp_table.long_description_ar,
        sp_table.short_description,
        sp_table.long_description,
        sp.is_loyalty_reward,
		    brand_taxon.brand_id,
        sp.electronic_product_code,
        sp.deleted_at,
        sp.crushable,
        sp.created_at,
        sp.updated_at,
        sp.cod_enabled,
        sp.available_on,
        sp.bundled,
        sp.bin_category_id,
        sv.width,
        sv.weight_increment,
        sv.weight,
        sv.sku,
        sv.perform_liquid_weight_check,
        sv.max_weight_per_order,
        sv.height,
        sv.depth,
        sv.default_weight_count,
        ds_country.country_id
)
SELECT 
  filtered_cte.id,
    filtered_cte.tax_category_id,
    filtered_cte.refundable,
    filtered_cte.moq_limit,
    filtered_cte.meta_title,
    filtered_cte.loyalty_point,
    filtered_cte.validity_tag_ar,
    filtered_cte.validity_tag,
    filtered_cte.slug,
    filtered_cte.size,
	filtered_cte.supplier_code as temp_supplier_code,
    filtered_cte.name_ar,
    filtered_cte.name,
    filtered_cte.meta_keywords_ar,
    filtered_cte.meta_keywords,
    filtered_cte.meta_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.meta_description,
    filtered_cte.short_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.long_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.short_description,
    filtered_cte.long_description,
    filtered_cte.issue_loyalty_points,
    filtered_cte.electronic_product_code,
    filtered_cte.is_deleted,
    filtered_cte.crushable,
    filtered_cte.created_at,
    filtered_cte.updated_at,
    filtered_cte.cod_enabled,
    filtered_cte.available_on,
    filtered_cte.bundled,
    filtered_cte.bin_category_id,
    filtered_cte.default_taxon_id,
    filtered_cte.width,
    filtered_cte.weight_increment,
    filtered_cte.weight,
    filtered_cte.sku,
    filtered_cte.perform_liquid_weight_check,
    filtered_cte.max_weight_per_order,
    filtered_cte.height,
    filtered_cte.depth,
    filtered_cte.default_weight_count,
    filtered_cte.promotable,
    filtered_cte.is_wishlisted,
    filtered_cte.is_gluten_free,
    filtered_cte.discount,
    filtered_cte.deactivate,
    filtered_cte.country_id,
    filtered_cte.category_id,
    filtered_cte.brand_id
FROM (
  SELECT 
    cte.*,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY id ORDER BY country_id) AS rn 
  FROM cte
) filtered_cte
WHERE rn = 1;

source.query:
With cte AS
  (select id, name as supplier_code 
  from supplier
)
UPDATE product p
SET supplier_id = cte.id
FROM cte
WHERE p.temp_supplier_code = cte.supplier_code;
WITH cte1 AS (
    SELECT id, temp_taxon_id
    FROM brand
)
UPDATE product p
SET brand_id = cte1.id
FROM cte1
WHERE p.temp_taxon_id = cte1.temp_taxon_id;
SELECT 'Update Supplier ID and Brand ID' as ID;

Alter table product add column temp_supplier_code varchar(200);
SELECT 'Adding Supplier_Code' As Update

select 
    id,
    product_id,
    barcode,
    created_at,
    updated_at
from spree_product_barcodes 
Order by id ASC;

SELECT id,
       viewable_id          AS product_id,
       attachment_file_name AS file_name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       1 as order
FROM   spree_assets
WHERE  viewable_type = 'Spree::Variant' 
Order by id ASC;

SELECT ppv.id,
       ppv.created_at,
       ppv.item_id AS inventory_modifier_id,
       ppv.whodunnit AS user_id,
	   pim.product_id,
	   pim.rule_supermarket_id as supermarket_id,
       ppv.object_changes,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_price'->>0)::numeric AS action_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_price'->>1)::numeric AS updated_action_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_sale_price'->>0)::numeric AS sale_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_sale_price'->>1)::numeric AS updated_sale_price,
       ppv.event
FROM spree_product_price_versions ppv
left join spree_product_inventory_modifiers pim
on pim.id = ppv.item_id
order by ppv.id;

WITH Cte AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    sp.id,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'en' THEN spt.name END), '') AS name_en,
    MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'en' THEN spt.description END) AS description_en,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'ar' THEN spt.name END), '') AS name_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'ar' THEN spt.description END) AS description_ar,
    UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'en' THEN spt.name END), ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) AS code,
    sp.expires_at,
    sp.starts_at,
    COALESCE(sp.usage_limit, 0) AS usage_limit,
    sp.match_policy,
    sp.created_at,
    sp.updated_at,
    sp.per_code_usage_limit,
    sp.apply_automatically,
    sp.deleted_at,
    TRUE AS is_visible
  FROM spree_promotions AS sp
  LEFT JOIN spree_promotion_translations AS spt ON spt.spree_promotion_id = sp.id
  WHERE spt.name IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY sp.id
  ORDER BY sp.id ASC
)
SELECT
  id,
  name_en,
  description_en,
  name_ar,
  description_ar,
  code,
  expires_at,
  starts_at,
  usage_limit,
  match_policy,
  created_at,
  updated_at,
  per_code_usage_limit,
  apply_automatically,
  deleted_at,
  is_visible
FROM (
  SELECT
    id,
    name_en,
    description_en,
    name_ar,
    description_ar,
    code,
    expires_at,
    starts_at,
    usage_limit,
    match_policy,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    per_code_usage_limit,
    apply_automatically,
    deleted_at,
    is_visible,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY name_en ORDER BY id) AS rn
  FROM Cte
) AS temp
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY name_en;

SELECT 
    au.id,
    COALESCE(sket_en.name, '') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(sket_en.recipe, '') AS recipe_en,
    au.calories,
    au.cuisine_id,
    CASE WHEN regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') <> '' 
         THEN CAST(regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') AS INTEGER)
         ELSE 0 
    END AS servings,
    au.updated_at,
    au.visible AS is_visible,
    au.created_at,
    COALESCE(sket_en.description, '') AS description_en,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.name, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.recipe, '') AS recipe_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.description, '') AS description_ar,
    1 AS country_id,
    '' AS cuisines_banner_image_url,
    '' AS recipe_banner_image_url,
    '' AS app_home_image_url,
    0 AS position
FROM 
    spree_kitchen_recipes au
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_en ON (sket_en.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_en.locale = 'en')
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_ar ON (sket_ar.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_ar.locale = 'ar');
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date  from recipe;

query.value:
SELECT 
    au.id,
    COALESCE(sket_en.name, '') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(sket_en.recipe, '') AS recipe_en,
    au.calories,
    au.cuisine_id,
    CASE WHEN regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') <> '' 
         THEN CAST(regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') AS INTEGER)
         ELSE 0 
    END AS servings,
    au.updated_at,
    au.visible AS is_visible,
    au.created_at,
    COALESCE(sket_en.description, '') AS description_en,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.name, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.recipe, '') AS recipe_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.description, '') AS description_ar,
    1 AS country_id,
    '' AS cuisines_banner_image_url,
    '' AS recipe_banner_image_url,
    '' AS app_home_image_url,
    0 AS position
FROM 
    spree_kitchen_recipes au
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_en ON (sket_en.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_en.locale = 'en')
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_ar ON (sket_ar.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_ar.locale = 'ar')
where au.updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';

source.query:
select 
swp.wishlist_id as shopping_list_id,
sv.product_id
From spree_wished_products swp
left join spree_variants sv on sv.id = swp.variant_id 
group by sv.product_id, swp.wishlist_id;

select
	id,
	user_id,
	name,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_wishlists;

select 
	id,
	user_id,
	category_id as store_credit_category_id,
	type_id as 	store_credit_type_id,
	created_by_id,
	amount,
	amount_used,
	amount_authorized,
	currency,
	LEFT(memo,200) as memo,
	invalidated_at,
	expires_at,
	created_at,
	updated_at,
	deleted_at
From spree_store_credits;

select
	id,
	name,
	available_to_admin,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_categories

select
	id,
	store_credit_id,
	action,
	amount,
	user_total_amount,
	authorization_code,
	update_reason_id,
	originator_type,
	originator_id,
	currency,
	COALESCE(created_at,current_timestamp) as created_at,
	COALESCE(updated_at,current_timestamp) as updated_at
From spree_store_credit_events;

select
	id,
	name,
	priority,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_types;

select
	id,
	name,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_update_reasons;

SELECT
  id AS super_market_id,
  payment_id,
  delivery_option_id
FROM (
  SELECT
    id,
    UNNEST(REGEXP_MATCHES(
      REPLACE(
        REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(payment_options::text, '^.*home_delivery:(.*)$', '\1'), 'store_pick_up:.*$', ''), '\n', ''),
        '''(\d+)''',
        '\1'
      ),
      '(\d+)',
      'g'
    ))::INTEGER AS payment_id,
    '1' AS delivery_option_id -- Home Delivery type id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%home_delivery%'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    id AS super_market_id,
    UNNEST(REGEXP_MATCHES(
      REPLACE(
        REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(payment_options::text, '^.*store_pick_up:(.*)$', '\1'), 'home_delivery:.*$', ''), '\n', ''),
        '''(\d+)''',
        '\1'
      ),
      '(\d+)',
      'g'
    ))::INTEGER AS payment_id,
    '2' AS delivery_option_id -- Store Pickup Delivery type id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%store_pick_up%'
) AS subquery_alias
ORDER BY super_market_id;

Alter sequence super_market_payment_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence ID' as Update;

select
   ds.id,
   dst.name,
	concat(dst.address1,' ',dst.address2) as address,
    LEFT(COALESCE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ds.phone, '+966', ''), '+973', ''), ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
   ds.country_id,
   ds.created_at,
   ds.state_id,
   lower(dst.city) as city,
   ds.updated_at,
   ds.visible as is_visible,
   ds.latitude,
   ds.longitude,
   ds.time_slots_schedule_time_offset_override AS time_slots_lead_time,
   ds.express_fee AS express_delivery_fee,
   ds.call_masking as call_mask,
   ds.min_item_total_for_free_delivery as minimum_total_amount_for_free_delivery,
   COALESCE(dst.description, '') as description
from danube_supermarkets ds
left join danube_supermarket_translations dst on dst.danube_supermarket_id =ds.id and dst.locale='en'
order by ds.id;

SELECT
  id AS supermarket_id, 
  2 AS delivery_option_id
FROM danube_supermarkets
WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%store_pick_up%'

UNION

SELECT
  id,
  1 AS delivery_option_id
FROM danube_supermarkets
WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%home_delivery%';

SELECT
    supermarket_id,
    2 AS delivery_type_id,
    (
        SELECT
            ('[' || string_agg(format('[%s,%s]', coordinate->1, coordinate->0), ',') || ']')::json
        FROM (
            SELECT json_array_elements((ST_AsGeoJSON(coverage)::json->'coordinates')->0) AS coordinate
        ) AS flattened
    ) AS delivery_region,
    ST_AsText(coverage) as delivery_area,
    ST_X(ST_AsText(center)) AS center_longitude,
    ST_Y(ST_AsText(center)) AS center_latitude,
    '#DEE513' AS fill_color,
    0.5 AS fill_color_opacity,
    '#5704FC' AS border_color,
    2 AS border_width
FROM
    danube_express_supermarkets;

WITH collected_geometries AS (
    SELECT 
        szm.zone_id,
        ST_ASText(sd.region) AS geom,
		AVG(ST_X(sd.center::geometry)) AS center_longitude,
        AVG(ST_Y(sd.center::geometry)) AS center_latitude,
		ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by zone_id order by zone_id) as row_num
	
    FROM 
        spree_districts sd
    JOIN 
        spree_zone_members szm ON sd.id = szm.zoneable_id
    WHERE 
        sd.visible = true
    GROUP BY 
        szm.zone_id, sd.region
), filtered_geometries AS(
SELECT zone_id,geom,center_longitude,center_latitude
FROM collected_geometries
where row_num = 1)
SELECT 
    sz.id,
    coalesce(ds.id) AS supermarket_id,
    1 AS delivery_type_id,
    (
	SELECT
            ('[' || string_agg(format('[%s,%s]', coordinate->1, coordinate->0), ',') || ']')::json
        FROM (
            SELECT json_array_elements((ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_GeometryN(cg.geom,1))::json->'coordinates')->0) AS coordinate
        ) AS flattened
    ) AS delivery_region,
    ST_ASText(geom) as delivery_area,
    cg.center_longitude,
    cg.center_latitude,
    '#DEE513' AS fill_color,
    0.5 AS fill_color_opacity,
    '#5704FC' AS border_color,
    2 AS border_width
FROM 
    spree_zones sz
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_supermarkets ds ON sz.id = ds.zone_id AND ds.supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_express')
LEFT JOIN 
    filtered_geometries cg ON sz.id = cg.zone_id
where geom is not null
and ds.id is not null

select * from (SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      1 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_and_express')
  UNION
  SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      2 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('express', 'regular_and_express')) as ds order by supermarket_id asc;

SELECT 
	  REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(spt.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS name,
-- 	  UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(MAX(spt.supplier_name), ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) as code,
	  LEFT(COALESCE(spt.code, ''), 10) AS code,
	  MAX(spt.created_at) as created_at,
	  MAX(spt.updated_at) as updated_at,
	  MAX(spt.deleted_at) as deleted_at
	FROM 
	  (SELECT
		spree_product_id,
		MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) as supplier_name,
		MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'ar' THEN manufacturer END) as code,
		MAX(created_at) as created_at,
		MAX(updated_at) as updated_at,
		MAX(deleted_at) as deleted_at
	  FROM spree_product_translations
	  WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL
	  GROUP BY spree_product_id) as spt
	GROUP BY spt.code;

alter sequence supplier_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence ID' As Update;

SELECT
    st.id,
    st.parent_id AS parent_id,
    st.position,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) as name,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink,
    st.taxonomy_id,
    st.created_at,
    st.updated_at,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords,
    st.visible,
    Date(st.start_time) AS start_date,
    Cast( Substring(To_char(st.start_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)  AS text) AS start_time,
    Date(st.end_time) AS end_date,
    Cast(Substring(To_char(st.end_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS text) AS end_time,
    st.product_text_tag_en,
    st.product_text_tag_ar,
    COALESCE(st.tag_to_show, '') AS tag_to_show,
    st.visible_only_for_subscriber,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) as name_ar,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords_ar,
    '' as pretty_name,
    '' as pretty_name_ar,
    'false' as featured
FROM
    spree_taxons st
LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt on stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
GROUP BY
    st.id;

SELECT 
    a.taxon_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN au.name = 'Danube' THEN (SELECT id FROM spree_countries WHERE name = 'Saudi Arabia')
        ELSE aua.id 
    END AS country_id
FROM spree_tenants_taxons a
LEFT JOIN spree_tenants au ON a.tenant_id = au.id
LEFT JOIN spree_countries aua ON aua.name = au.name;

select 
    id,
    name,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    key,
	true as visible
from spree_taxon_groups;

select 
    taxon_group_id,
    taxon_id,
    position
from spree_taxon_group_memberships;

select st.id,
        stt.name,
        st.created_at, 
        st.updated_at,
        st.position,
        1 AS category_id
from spree_taxonomies st
left join spree_taxonomy_translations stt
on st.id = stt.spree_taxonomy_id
and locale='en';

SELECT 
    spree_shipping_method_id AS delivery_option_id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday' 
        ELSE '' 
    END AS day_of_week, 
    cast(dts.start_time as text), 
    cast(dts.end_time as text), 
    dts.enabled, 
    1 AS country_id 
FROM 
    danube_time_slots_schedules dtss 
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_time_slots dts ON dtss.time_slot_id = dts.id 
where dts.enabled
GROUP BY 
    dtss.time_slot_id, 
    dtss.spree_shipping_method_id, 
    dtss.day_of_week, 
    dts.start_time, 
    dts.end_time, 
    dts.enabled;

alter sequence time_slot_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence ID' as Update;

with cte as
(SELECT
  u.id,
  CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  u.email,
  'others' as gender,
  COALESCE(CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),'') AS country_code,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  cast(u.dob as Text) as dob ,
  COALESCE(u.referral_code, '') AS referral_code,
  CASE WHEN u.locale ='en' THEN 1
	ELSE 2
   END AS language_id,
  a.city,
  a.latitude,
  a.longitude,
--   when country_id is '0' updated as '1' 
  CASE
    WHEN a.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE a.country_id
  END AS country_id,
  True as receive_marketing_promotions,
  case 
  	when sua.provider = 'google_oauth2' then 'google'
	else sua.provider end as login_type,
	sua.uid as social_id,
	0 as balance,
	u.blacklisted_at,
	u.blacklisted_reason,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by u.id order by sua.updated_at desc) as rn

FROM spree_users u
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses ua ON u.id = ua.user_id AND ua.default = TRUE
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses a ON ua.address_id = a.id
left join spree_user_authentications sua on u.id = sua.user_id 
ORDER BY u.id ASC)

select id, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at, first_name, last_name, email, gender, country_code, mobile_number, dob, referral_code, language_id, city,
	latitude, longitude, country_id, receive_marketing_promotions, login_type, social_id, balance, blacklisted_at, blacklisted_reason
	from cte 
	where rn = 1;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from public.user;

query.value:
with cte as
(SELECT
  u.id,
  CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  u.email,
  'others' as gender,
  COALESCE(CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),'') AS country_code,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  cast(u.dob as Text) as dob ,
  COALESCE(u.referral_code, '') AS referral_code,
  CASE WHEN u.locale ='en' THEN 1
	ELSE 2
   END AS language_id,
  a.city,
  a.latitude,
  a.longitude,
--   when country_id is '0' updated as '1' 
  CASE
    WHEN a.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE a.country_id
  END AS country_id,
  True as receive_marketing_promotions,
  case 
  	when sua.provider = 'google_oauth2' then 'google'
	else sua.provider end as login_type,
	sua.uid as social_id,
	0 as balance,
	u.blacklisted_at,
	u.blacklisted_reason,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by u.id order by sua.updated_at desc) as rn

FROM spree_users u
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses ua ON u.id = ua.user_id AND ua.default = TRUE
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses a ON ua.address_id = a.id
left join spree_user_authentications sua on u.id = sua.user_id 
ORDER BY u.id ASC)

select id, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at, first_name, last_name, email, gender, country_code, mobile_number, dob, referral_code, language_id, city,
latitude, longitude, country_id, receive_marketing_promotions, login_type, social_id, balance, blacklisted_at, blacklisted_reason
from cte 
where rn = 1
and updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';
